# Build Package

```{r package-build, eval=F}
plib::autoCommit()
codeDir <- file.path(Sys.getenv("HOME"),"GitLab","plib")
setwd(codeDir)
devtools::load_all()
devtools::document()
devtools::build_vignettes()
devtools::install(reload=T)
```
